pages.text:
[Page Title: Home | Amalfi's]

top of page TAKE OUT CLICK HERE! Benvenuto! Welcome to our restaurant. We specialize in Italian cuisine. Our recipes stem from our roots in Napoli, Italy.  Here at Amalfi's we use only the finest ingredients and the freshest products available.  Pizza, pasta, strombolis, calzones, subs, traditional Italian entrees and more! From our delicious homemade sauces to our wonderful homemade dough and breads, you find them all superb.  We hope to see you soon.  A presto!  Grazie! Call Now! Order TAKE OUT HERE! bottom of page

[Page Title: Menu | Amalfi's]

Menu Antipasti Caprese Fresh sliced tomato and fresh buffalo mozzarella on a bed of our homemade balsamic house dressing, Topped with basil, oregano and olive oil, $12.50 Impepata Di Cozze Traditional Neapolitan dish. Mussels cooked in with fresh garlic, Italian parsley, black pepper, white wine, EVOO, & lemon. $14.25 Vesuvio 3 Homemade arancini, 3 homemade meatballs, and a side of fresh fried calamari. $15.50 Bruschetta Marinated tomatoes with garlic, olive oil, and fresh herbs served over homemade crusted bread. $11.95 Calamari Lightly breaded fresh cut calamari served with side of homemade marinara. $12.95 Antipasto Thin sliced prosciutto, soppressata, buffalo mozzarella, asiago cheese, kalamata olives, and fresh marinated vegetables. $15.50 Pizza Appetizers Chicken Wings Spicy wings served with ranch or blue cheese. $10.75 Mozzarella Sticks 8 breaded mozzarella sticks served with marinara. $10.50 Garlic Knots 12 garlic knots served with marinara. $8.50 Arancini Homemade rolled balls of rice,
